body: Some of the Dolls on the first page seem as though they willingly posed for this man, seeing as their bodies harden during the process. That's some big brain, Zoro thinking!
With great power comes great responsibility?

Wow, god gave me the power to change the bodies of people I touch. I should use this power to de-age the woman I fell in love with and use it every now and then to keep her looking young. Oh wait, no. That would make too much sense. Time to start a mannequin collection I guess
Yoshikage Kira if he wanted to fuck mannequins:

i know this is a hentai but judging from the sheer amount of girls he have in his closet wouldn't there be at least someone who called the police to inform them about someone is missing ? considering that at least 1 or 2 of these girl would share to their friends or family that they have a boyfriend cause realistically he would be investigated then arrested by the police sooner or later
This is good but if I’d had that power i would make sure they stay dolls and break their will power and hit big

Is this guy's ideology sane? If I were to gain a superpower of my dreams suddenly would I also count it as an act of god? I might. The whole time I was thinking, "In the modern world doll makers are robotics and they are actively trying to make moving intelligent dolls. This guy is going completely in reverse." The second thing I was thinking was, "Hey, if you can change peoples bodies with bizarrely no limits couldn't you just make it so that your girlfriend didn't age and make her more beautiful at the same time. If he did that he would have a lineup of women begging to be touched, but instead he keeps these girls silently in his very large closet." (Frowny Face)
Im gonna ask if hes a seller, but dayum i dont mind having one of them dolls and who said dolls are only for girl well...they're right about that
